question.content: The sales director has repeatedly demonstrated his ability to improve sales when ………with a challenge.
We are seeking to hire an ………editor to work on our newsletters, the weekly Business Press, and the monthly Business World.
Our special offer ………August 7 and is limited to Com Cable Video customers in serviceable areas only.
During his address to employees at a company meeting, Mr. Miller explained the new strategy and warned of the coming restructuring expected ………the next six months.
According to a recent report, the percentage of delayed and ………flights increased from a year earlier.
It is advisable to make a shopping list to make sure you purchase just ………you need or want.
To get a refund for any defective ………customers need to return it with a receipt within 30 days of purchase.
According to a press release, the unemployment rate is the ………in five years.
The company decided to no longer ……… subscription fees to users who switch Internet service providers form another provider.
Any department that has not turned in its ………monthly budget reports should submit them by the end of the week.
